text: The 1923–24 Fall River F.C. season was the third season for the club in the American Soccer League. The club claimed the double by winning the ASL championship and the National Challenge Cup and was one game away from a treble losing the American Cup final to Bethlehem Steel F.C.. ==American Soccer League== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Date !Opponents !H/A !Result F–A !Scorers !Attendance |- bgcolor="#ddffdd" |7 October 1923 |National Giants F.C. |H |2-1 |Reid (2) | |- bgcolor="#ffffdd" |13 October 1923 |J. & P.
